snippet.title: The Elder Scrolls Travels: Shadowkey (N-Gage) - Full Game 1080p60 HD Walkthrough - No Commentary
snippet.description:
To the best of my knowledge, this walkthrough contains the entire game: every single quest, all unique weapons and armor, every location, the final battle and the credits.

This game was recorded with Elgato HD60 on the EKA2L1 emulator, then edited in Adobe Premiere Pro (the actual game is not available in widescreen, but I stretched the video for the purpose of this walkthrough).

If you enjoyed watching this video, please leave a like and subscribe! I would very much appreciate it!

So N-Gage games are pretty rare on YouTube, let alone played and recorded in high quality like this. I came across this amazing new Symbian / N-Gage emulator called EKA2L1 that surprisingly worked on my Windows 10. It took some effort, but I got Shadowkey working which is all wanted as a true Elder Scrolls fan. Keep in mind while the game worked fine and didn't crash for me, it can get stuck, so save often! For me the Skeleton Key would occasionally freeze the game, as well as placing the fifth Star Tooth in the final battle of the game. Reloading the game and trying again is your best bet!

If you only just started playing Shadowkey, don't give up yet. You HAVE to get used to the controls and prepare yourself for directions on where to go to next. Since this game is pretty confusing at times, I recommend you use this walkthrough or one of the area maps online. 

Link to EKA2L1 Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCdPQT6Le2xw_z9cutkVwyA
This is where a showcase can be found, along with a link to GitHub, where the experimental emulator and a bunch of playable games can be downloaded free of charge. Credits go to the developer, for making this possible!

The Elder Scrolls Travels: Shadowkey (N-Gage) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9cwshsceNVqJjwxI1UVXr_

An Elder Scrolls Legend: Battlespire (MS-DOS) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf89f1FQswY7SEuTGcyea162
The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9v8Loje3EjNz-BvJp31G_W
The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion (PC) OLD playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9ulO_wqDsKrVfZi4_LN37c
The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion - Game of the Year Edition (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf_phswC_MjRAAlgl6dsx32S
The Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9_jvdicImetFPXucOxwdpc
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - Legendary Edition + MODS (PC) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-C4J6TUOOem1f7Qs-tim-0

Story: Your village has safely remained just out of reach of The War of the Bend'r-mahk, but now danger strikes from another direction. You must save your village from marauders who are but pawns in the struggle to capture Shadowmage Skelos Undriel -- a piece in a darker and more sinister game. You'll journey through rugged terrain, despoiled temples, bandit lairs, and murderous caverns. You'll fight many foes in your search for the power of the Shadowkeys and the Star Teeth, and your journey will lead you to the Crypt of the Heart where you'll face the ultimate test.

Shadowmage Skelos Undriel is on the run from Battlemage Jagar Tharn, driven from the heart of Tamriel by Tharn's agents, who are in dogged pursuit. Undriel chooses to flee to the Western Reach, an area in the throes of The War of the Bend'r-mahk between High Rock, Hammerfell and Skyrim. The Shadowmage hides himself in the chaos swirling about Dragonstar. Skelos Undriel then hatches a desperate scheme to collect the Star Teeth sown about the region hoping their power is sufficient to thwart Tharn's agents, and perhaps even destroy the Battlemage himself.

The Elder Scrolls Travels Shadowkey features:

- First-person RPG set in the best-selling, award-winning world of The Elder Scrolls.
- Artwork and design by members of the award-winning Elder Scrolls and Morrowind teams.
- Explore 20 large dungeon levels ranging from wilderness levels to dense and complex city and hideout levels in a detailed and open-ended fantasy setting. You can even play the dungeons with your friends in cooperative multiplayer mode via Bluetooth.
- Play the classic Elder Scrolls nine character classes and eight character races. Character classes include Assassin, Barbarian, Battlemage, Knight, Nightblade, Rogue, Spellsword, Sorcerer, and Thief. Races include Argonian, Breton, High Elf, Dark Elf, Khajiit, Nord, Redguard, and Wood Elf.
- Shadowkey has over 25 magic spells, more than 60 opponents, and over 100 weapons and items.

Release Date - November 11, 2004
Genre - First-Person Action Role-Playing
Platforms - Nokia N-Gage, N-Gage QD
Publisher - Vir2L Studios, TKO Software, Nokia
Developer - Vir2L Studios, TKO Software

My Xbox gamertag: TGG Yari
My PlayStation gamertag: ToughGamingGuyYT
My Steam: ToughGamingGuy

Wanna see more of my fantastic walkthroughs? Give it a go: https://www.youtube.com/user/ToughGamingGuy
